titles.title: Foster Care Living Arrangements Act of 1994
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that a foster care provider and qualified foster individual may share the same home.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E188-189)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

bill.summary: 2/11/1994--Introduced. Foster Care Living Arrangements Act of 1994 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that for purposes of excluding foster care payments from gross income, the foster care provider's home includes shared living arrangements under which the foster individual owns or leases the home in which the foster care provider principally resides.
